Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Air conditioning pack failure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 14/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta
